stanza.line: When I consider every thing that growsgrows
Holds in perfection but a little momentmoment
That this huge stage presenteth nought but showsshows
Whereon the stars in secret influence commentcomment
When I perceive that men as plants increaseincrease
Cheered and checked even by the self-same skysky
Vaunt in their youthful sap at height decreasedecrease
And wear their brave state out of memorymemory
Then the conceit of this inconstant staystay
Sets you most rich in youth before my sightsight
Where wasteful time debateth with decaydecay
To change your day of youth to sullied nightnight
And all in war with Time for love of youyou
As he takes from you I engraft you newnew
